title: moovaasai koNDa
sahitya:
mUvAshai koNda tirumAl munivar tozhum mukunadanenum perumAL



anupallavi



dEvendiran iDar tIrkkum sahAyan tiruDit-tiruDi veNNai tinginra



caraNam



pArkkaDal kalakki shrIdEviyai eDuttAn paNam koDutta shEDan mElErip-paDuttAn
 pArellAm aLandu mAbali kuDi keDuttAn paNbuDan harikEsha nagar tannaiyaDuttAn
